society.headline: Trump Tries Making Regime-Change Great Again in Venezuela
society.teaser: Knocking over the government was always going to be the easy part. The post Trump Tries Making Regime-Change Great Again in Venezuela appeared first on The American Conservative.

society.headline: The Lie of “Self-Financing” Oil Wars
society.teaser: The US attack on Venezuela relies on the same deception that justified the war in Iraq: the idea of self-financing wars with oil. President Trump said Saturday that the US will run Venezuela...
